name: part_003
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】かなたそとっ♡神曲アニソンFes!! ⧸ Amane Kanata AnimeSong 3DLIVE 【#天音かなた爆誕2024 ⧸ ホロライブ】 [lVQlIvUr5Dc]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Amane Kanata and AZKi perform 'Yuusha' (The Brave) by YOASOBI.
Amane Kanata, AZKi, and Sakamata Chloe perform 'Sobakasu' (Freckles) by JUDY AND MARY.

subtitles.original: それはかつてこの地に影を落とした悪を
subtitles.english: The memories of the short journey with the hero

subtitles.original: 撃ち取りし勇者との短い旅の記憶
subtitles.english: who defeated the evil that once cast a shadow over this land.

subtitles.original:
勇者
作詞・作曲：Ayase
subtitles.english:
The Brave
Lyrics & Composition: Ayase

subtitles.original: 物語は終わり 勇者は眠りにつく
subtitles.english: The story ends, and the hero goes to sleep,

subtitles.original: 穏やかな日常をこの地に残して
subtitles.english: leaving a peaceful daily life in this land.

subtitles.original: 時の流れは無情に人を忘れさせる
subtitles.english: The passage of time heartlessly makes people forget,

subtitles.original: そこに生きた軌跡も錆び付いていく
subtitles.english: and the traces of life there begin to rust away.

subtitles.original: それでも君の言葉も願いも勇気も
subtitles.english: Even so, your words, your wishes, and your courage

subtitles.original: 今も確かに私の中で生きている
subtitles.english: are still certainly living within me today.

subtitles.original: 同じ道を選んだそれだけだったはずなのに
subtitles.english: It should have been just that we chose the same path,

subtitles.original: いつの間にかどうして
subtitles.english: but before I knew it, why...

subtitles.original: 頬を伝う涙の理由をもっと知りたいんだ
subtitles.english: ...do I want to know more about why tears run down my cheeks?

subtitles.original: 今更だって共に歩んだ旅路を辿れば
subtitles.english: Even if it's too late, if I trace back the journey we walked together,

subtitles.original: そこに君は居なくともきっと見つけられる
subtitles.english: even if you aren't there, I'm sure I can find it.

subtitles.original: 物語は続く一人の旅路へと発つ
subtitles.english: The story continues as I set out on a solo journey,

subtitles.original: 立ち寄る街で出会う人の記憶の中に残る君は
subtitles.english: remaining in the memories of the people I meet in the towns I visit.

subtitles.original: 相も変わらずお人好しで格好つけてばかりだね
subtitles.english: You're still as soft-hearted and showing off as ever, aren't you?

subtitles.original: あちらこちらに作ったシンボルは勝ち取った平和の証
subtitles.english: The symbols we built here and there are proof of the peace we won.

subtitles.original: それすら未来でいつか私が一人にならないように
subtitles.english: Even those were left as markers so that I won't be alone in the future,

subtitles.original: あの旅を思い出せるように残された目印
subtitles.english: so that I can remember that journey.

subtitles.original: まるで御伽の話終わり迎えた証
subtitles.english: Just like a fairy tale, proof of reaching the end.

subtitles.original: 私を変えた出会い百分の一の旅路
subtitles.english: The encounter that changed me, a journey of one percent.

subtitles.original: 君の勇気をいつか風がさらって
subtitles.english: Even if the wind sweeps away your courage one day,

subtitles.original: 誰の記憶から消えてしまっても
subtitles.english: and it vanishes from everyone's memory,

subtitles.original: 私が未来に連れていくから
subtitles.english: I will carry it with me into the future.

subtitles.original: 君の手を取ったあの日全て始まった
subtitles.english: Everything began that day when I took your hand.

subtitles.original: くだらなくて思わずふっと笑ってしまうような
subtitles.english: The trivial moments that make me break into a smile,

subtitles.original: ありふれた時間が今も眩しい
subtitles.english: those ordinary times are still dazzling now.

subtitles.original: 知りたいんだ今更だって振り返るとそこにはいつでも
subtitles.english: I want to know, even now, because whenever I look back,

subtitles.original: 優しく微笑みかける君がいるから
subtitles.english: you are always there, smiling gently at me.

subtitles.original: 新たな旅の始まりは
subtitles.english: The start of a new journey

subtitles.original: 君が守り抜いたこの地に
subtitles.english: in this land that you protected,

subtitles.original: 芽吹いた命と
subtitles.english: along with the life

subtitles.original: 共に
subtitles.english: that has budded here.

subtitles.original:
そばかす
作詞：YUKI　作曲：恩田快人
subtitles.english:
Sobakasu (Freckles)
Lyrics: YUKI, Composition: Yoshihito Onda

subtitles.original: 大キライだったそばかすをちょっと
subtitles.english: I'd touch the freckles I hated so much,

subtitles.original: ひとなでしてタメ息をひとつ
subtitles.english: and let out a little sigh.

subtitles.original: ヘヴィー級の恋は見事に
subtitles.english: That heavyweight love

subtitles.original: 角砂糖と一緒に溶けた
subtitles.english: melted away perfectly, just like a sugar cube.

subtitles.original: 前よりももっとやせた胸にちょっと
subtitles.english: The thorn that prickles

subtitles.original: チクっとささるトゲが痛い
subtitles.english: my chest, now thinner than before, hurts a bit.

subtitles.original: 星占いもあてにならないわ
subtitles.english: I can't even rely on horoscopes anymore.

subtitles.original: もっと遠くまで一緒にゆけたら
subtitles.english: If only we could have gone much further together...

subtitles.original: ねぇ
subtitles.english: Hey,

subtitles.original: うれしくてそれだけで
subtitles.english: I'd be happy just with that.

subtitles.original: 想い出はいつもキレイだけど
subtitles.english: Memories are always beautiful, but

subtitles.original: それだけじゃおなかがすくわ
subtitles.english: that alone isn't enough to satisfy me.

subtitles.original: 本当はせつない夜なのに
subtitles.english: Even though it's actually a painful night,

subtitles.original: どうしてかしら？
subtitles.english: I wonder why?

subtitles.original: あの人の笑顔も
subtitles.english: I can't even remember

subtitles.original: 思い出せないの
subtitles.english: that person's smile.
